pageTitle: GAMBIT MODELING GUIDE: 3. MESHING THE MODEL, 3.3
textBeforeTable: The following commands are available on the Mesh/Face subpad. 3.3 Face Meshing Commands
textAfterTable: Smooth Face Meshes Adjusts face mesh node positions to improve uniformity of node spacing Set Face Vertex Type Specifies the characteristics of a face mesh in the vicinity of a corner Set Face Element Type Specifies face element types used throughout the model Link Face Meshes Unlink Face Meshes Creates or removes mesh hard links between faces Modify Meshed Face Split Meshed Face Converts mesh edges to topological equivalents; splits faces along boundaries defined by mesh node locations Summarize Face Mesh Check Face Meshes Displays mesh information in the graphics window; summarizes face mesh quality information Delete Face Meshes Deletes existing mesh nodes and/or elements from faces 3.3.1 Mesh Faces The Mesh Faces operation (face mesh and
